LanguageData.Hediffs_CraftingLv1.label: Crafts Expertise Lv.1
LanguageData.Hediffs_CraftingLv1.description: Kōgei (Crafts) Expertise Tip 1: You can activate this skill's Level 1 and 2 buffs even after you acquire the permanent Level 3 and 4 buffs!
LanguageData.Hediffs_CraftingLv2.label: Crafts Expertise Lv.2
LanguageData.Hediffs_CraftingLv2.description: Kōgei (Crafts) Expertise Tip 2: There are also processed foods that accumulate experience points even if the ability boost is not activated.
LanguageData.Hediffs_Crafting.label: Crafts Expertise
LanguageData.Hediffs_Crafting.description: Kōgei (Crafts) Expertise: I eat with gratitude for all the ingredients in the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
LanguageData.Hediffs_Crafting.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.Hediffs_Crafting.stages.1.label: Lv.3
LanguageData.Hediffs_Crafting.stages.2.label: Lv.4 Max
